tool.name: organism
tool.command:
tripaille organism sync
#if $organism: --organism "$organism" #end if #if $organism_id: --organism_id "$organism_id" #end if #if $job_name: --job_name "$job_name" #end if #if $no_wait: $no_wait #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: organism
param.label: Organism
param.help: Common name of the organism to sync

param.name: organism_id
param.label: Organism Id
param.help: ID of the organism to sync

param.name: no_wait
param.label: No Wait
param.help: Return immediately without waiting for job completion
